gw.api.financials

Class CurrencyAmountPair

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.financials.CurrencyAmountPair
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMoney, IPairedMoney, java.lang.Comparable<CurrencyAmountPair>

    public class CurrencyAmountPair
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPairedMoney, java.lang.Comparable<CurrencyAmountPair>
    Represents the same amount of money in two currencies.

    Note that the natural ordering is inconsistent with equals. Two CurrencyAmountPairs are equal iff both primary and secondary amounts are equal.

    Author:
    pdalbora
